name: Amazing Ngapali Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel a beautiful architecture in an amazing sourounding.
reviews.title: a very nice hotel to relaxe

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Title says it all Amazing , Great staff and Manager
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Note to Manager , Have you got a Union Flag yet ?
reviews.title: Amazing is amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have been to Amazing Resort Ngapali for four straight years. Considering that we come from the USA and getting there is not simple that says a lot. Amazing is one of the places we can't wait to tell people about but then think "maybe we should keep it a secret" because if everyone finds out about it things will change. We find it amazing to find a pristine beach next to a high-end resort with service-orientated staff and none of the annoyances found elsewhere. The sand is soft, the sun is warm, the sea is gentle, no annoying vendors, the entire area is safe, our room was wonderful, staff is excellent... what more could one what? No jet skis, no discos... just a wonderful place to get away.
reviews.title: AMAZING

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great stay in some lovely surroundings. The hotel is new and very clean. ALL personnel are the most service-minded and friendly men people we ever met. We can only give our best recommendations to come and visit this beautiful hotel.
reviews.title: Quiet serene place on a beautiful beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a most delightful hotel, with excellent big bedrooms, and with large terrace balconies with good views over the sea.
reviews.title: EXTREMELY NICE HOTEL.............

reviews.text: We stayed at a time when the hotel was relatively quiet - just before the Burmese Water Festival - and the superb beach was empty and the sunloungers plentiful.
reviews.title: A must to go

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff throughout the hotel were genuinely pleased to welcome their visitors, and happy to increase the spicy strength of the very nice Mynamar Beef Curry which was my favourite.
reviews.title: Very Good Hotel With Excellent Beach

reviews.text: Hiring a bike to cycle along the quiet roads to the local village, or further afield to the nearest small market town (about 1 hour) was great fun, with everyone shouting a cheerful 'Hallo' as you trundled along.
reviews.title: Great hotel friendly staff

reviews.text: Definitely a good choice, very pleasant stay indeed.
reviews.title: Truly amazing

reviews.text: My friend and I had the pleasure of staying at the Amazing Nagapali and we can tell you that it was truely an amazing experience. The staff, both in housekeeping, the restaurant and the reception were the most helpful and friendly people we have ever met. We had the pleasure of meeting with the General Manager and we hope that we expressed how very satisfied we were with everything. The accomodations were excellent and the resort just beautufil. We HIGHLY recommend this resort for a rest before heading home or for a truly relaxing vacation. We LOVE the people of Burma, you are kind, respectful and just plain GREAT. We love your country!
reviews.title: Amazing Experience

reviews.text: I cannot say much that has not been said in the previous enthusiastic reviews. The "Amazing" is a little paradise.
reviews.title: A few Days in Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I love the people of Myanmar, and here I found the best of them.
reviews.title: This hotel really lives up to it's name.

reviews.text: I care for space, cleanliness, attention to detail, inside and outside of my room, and here I have it. When being asked for suggestions for improvements, I couldn't name any.
reviews.title: beyond expectation

reviews.text: What seemed to be a disadvantage at the beginning, i.e. the lack of infrastructure, attractions or entertainment in the vicinity of the resort, became irrelevant once I had arrived - I never desired to leave the place. I wandered around in the gardens, I enjoyed my cocktail on the terrace at sunset, I ate too much at breakfast and dinner, I loved the gentle live music after dinner, and it was so easy to be friends with everybody.
reviews.title: lovely service :)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ngapali beach is covered with a lot of Hotels, The Amazing resort has a unique place, because it is separated from all the other ones, also very near to the airport without any noisy disturbation, it has the best beach at Ngapali.
reviews.title: Unbelievable charming and unique

reviews.text: The complete staff is uniquely friendly and whatever happens, they fulfill every wish, the guests have.
reviews.title: A wonderful stay in this Hotel

reviews.text: A wonderful place and great hearted people. I travel a lot, but this place is really charming and ones in a life, tourists should make this experience in this hotel.
reviews.title: won me over

reviews.text: We stay 16 days in Amazing Ngapali resort. This was a wonderful stay. The Hotel Crew Members are verry frindly and very attentive to the guests!
reviews.title: A little piece of paradise

reviews.text: The Bungolows are clean and the food excelent. Outside you find also smal Restaurants with delicius food. Only the water in pool was for us to cool.
reviews.title: Silent quiet rest in a remarkable place

description: Nestled on the most beautiful beach in Myanmar, 45 minutes away from bustling city of Yangon by air and 5 minutes drive from Sandoway Airport, Amazing Ngapali Resort is ultimate hedonistic resort that redefines escapism in its beauty, luxury and conception. The view from the lobby takes in the gentle waves and allowing its guests an exhilarating feeling of spaciousness and an affinity with the natural surroundings, lushly landscaped gardens and pool.
